title: HOUR 3- Tim Livingston Oct 22, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Tim Livingston Oct 22, 2020
description:
Tim Livingston tells Dan he believes that David Stern and the NBA leaked the Tim Donaghy story to the press. Tim says that David Stern had a great way of silencing the Tim Donaghy story so it could close a big TV revenue deal. Tim tells Dan that investigating what the NBA knew and who all was involved; is better story than the Donaghy story.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
